abstract: Lawyers for Michael Jackson’s doctor, Conrad Murray, bring in Dr Paul White as scientific witness to his trial for involuntary manslaughter; White testifies that Jackson injected himself with propofol after the initial dose wore off, causing his own death.
snippet: Lawyers for Michael Jackson’s doctor dropped the bombshell Friday they have been hinting at for months — an expert opinion accusing the singer of causing his own death.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for Michael Jackson’s doctor dropped the bombshell Friday they have been hinting at for months — an expert opinion accusing the singer of causing his own death.

headline.main: California: Witness Testifies Jackson Caused His Own Death
headline.print_headline: California: Witness Testifies Jackson Caused His Own Death
